resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
permission required fail, please click the "Go To Setting" to manual authorization
Storage permission is required to provide the read/write operation of the local storage of data
Calendar permission is required to read calendars and add/modify/delete calendars
Camera permission is required to take photo and video
Location permission is required to provide you with the finest information about your device
Recording permission is required to call mic for recording
Contact permission is required to access contact information and add/modify/delete contact information
Call permission is required to make calls and view call records
Sensor permission is required to obtain sensor related health conditions
SMS permission is required to read SMS and create/modify/delete/send information
Device permission is required to obtain information about the device
